name: The user can add products to cart by clicking "Add to cart" button in product detail page of each product

testSteps.description: Example #1: {product=SriHome 4MP Trọn Bộ 4 Camera Dahua IP 2MP Full HD 1080P, Có Mic Trọn Bộ 4 Camera Dahua IP 2MP Full HD 1080P, Có Mic}

children.description: When Click on any product to go to detail page of it
And Click Add to cart button detail page
Then The product "SriHome 4MP Trọn Bộ 4 Camera Dahua IP 2MP Full HD 1080P, Có Mic Trọn Bộ 4 Camera Dahua IP 2MP Full HD 1080P, Có Mic" appears in cart

userStory.narrative: I want to add products to cart

title: The user can add products to cart by clicking "Add to cart" button in product detail page of each product

values: SriHome 4MP Trọn Bộ 4 Camera Dahua IP 2MP Full HD 1080P, Có Mic Trọn Bộ 4 Camera Dahua IP 2MP Full HD 1080P, Có Mic

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given Open homepage
When Click on any product to go to detail page of it
And Click Add to cart button detail page
And Close detail page
And Open the cart
Then The product "<product>" appears in cart
